🚀 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐬! 

🎉 𝗠𝗼𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘆: 𝗔 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗪𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝗡𝗼𝘄 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 🚨 𝗗𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱 𝗡𝗼𝘄 - https://lnkd.in/gtAt95AH
 
I'm thrilled to share a game-changing product in the Fintech industry. Our journey, from the very first sketch on a whiteboard to the refined interface you see today, has been a fantastic adventure full of problem-solving and lakhs of design iterations (𝘕𝘰𝘵 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯 𝘬𝘪𝘥𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 😮‍💨)

🤔 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗼𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘆?
It's a new way to invest that we believe will simplify investing, empower you to invest with confidence, and unlock the full potential of your hard-earned money.

🤨 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗸𝗲𝘀 𝗠𝗼𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘆 𝗱𝗶𝗳𝗳𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝘀? Oh, you're in for a treat ✨

1️⃣ Create a basket with multiple investment assets like Digital Gold, Flex (Peer-to-Peer Lending), Mutual Funds, Fixed Deposits, and more.

2️⃣ Now invest in the created basket, set up a SINGLE SIP (no more difficulty managing multiple SIPs on Multiple platforms every month), or simply set up 🛝slide to invest idle money left in your bank account.

3️⃣ KYC is so easy that it feels like a breeze.

4️⃣ A single platform for your diverse investment needs.

PS: Your feedback is invaluable to us, as it helps us continually improve and refine MoMoney for Mo benefits for all of you.

Here's to a future filled with financial possibilities 🍻

Senior Product Designer at xto10x | Ex-MoMoney | Ex-Parallelhq
1mo • Edited • 
 1 month ago • Edited • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Disappointed with Myntra’s misleading order tracking and lack of transparency 🚨

I had ordered a sofa-cum-bed from Myntra, excited to set it up for my guests. The app showed all the right updates — Packed, Shipped, and even Arriving Today on June 9. Naturally, I was looking forward to the delivery.

But the sofa never arrived. 🙁

The status changed to “Delivery Delayed” with standard apology messages. After waiting for 2 more days, I checked the tracking on the delivery partner’s platform (Delhivery), only to find that the item was never picked up and was cancelled by the merchant days ago. 🤷‍♂️

Then why did Myntra show that it was shipped and arriving? Why was I never informed that the order had been cancelled? If I had known, I would’ve placed a new order right away — but instead, I kept waiting.

This experience has not only wasted my time but also caused major inconvenience — I now have no bed for my guests, and the excitement of setting up my space has turned into frustration.

Thank you,, for this broken experience.





Attaching screenshots for reference.
